mapper.select: select m.NAME as NAME , m.MEM_TEL as MEM_TEL, m.EMAIL as EMAIL, r.REV_PEOPLE as REV_PEOPLE, r.HELP_CHECK as HELP_CHECK, r.SECTOR_NUM as SECTOR_NUM, r.REV_DATE as REV_DATE, r.ENTER_DATE as ENTER_DATE, r.EXIT_DATE as EXIT_DATE from REV r, MEMBER m where m.name='스프링'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REV ( REV_NUM, REV_PEOPLE, ENTER_DATE, EXIT_DATE, MEM_NUM, SECTOR_NUM ) values( seq.nextVal #{rev_People}, #{enter_Date}, #{exit_Date}, #{mem_Num}, #{sector_Num} )
mapper.select: select A.CGROUND_INFO_NUM, A.CGROUND_NAME, A.CGROUND_LOCATION, A.CGROUND_TEL, A.CGROUND_DEPOSIT, A.CAMPING_ENTER, A.CAMPING_EXIT, A.CGROUND_DETAIL_INFO, A.ADD_FACIL, A.REV_COUNT, A.LOCATION_CITY_NUM, B.SECTOR_NUM, C.CAMPING_TYPE_NUM, C.CAMPING_TYPE_NAME FROM CGROUND_INFO A, SECTOR B, CAMPING_TYPE C WHERE 1=1 AND A.CGROUND_INFO_NUM = B.CGROUND_INFO_NUM AND B.CAMPING_TYPE_NUM = C.CAMPING_TYPE_NUM AND B.SECTOR_NUM = #{sector_num}
